mapper.select: SELECT STUDY_INFO.STUDY_CODE as studyCode , STUDY_INFO.STUDY_NAME as studyName , STUDY_INFO.STUDY_TOPIC as studyTopic , STUDY_INFO.STUDY_LIMIT as studyLimit , STUDY_INFO.STUDY_AREA as studyArea , ( SELECT USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_INFO.USER_CODE = STUDY_INFO.STUDY_RGSTUS_ID ) as userName , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_IN_STUDY WHERE USER_IN_STUDY.STUDY_CODE = STUDY_INFO.STUDY_CODE) as totalCount FROM STUDY_INFO WHERE STUDY_INFO.USE_YN = 'Y' AND STUDY_INFO.STUDY_CODE IN (SELECT STUDY_CODE FROM USER_IN_STUDY WHERE USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y' )

SELECT TITLE as title , START_DT as startDt , START_HM as startHm , END_DT as endDt , END_HM as endHm , TYPE as type , CONTENT as content , STUDY_CODE as studyCode , CALENDAR_CODE as calendarCode , (SELECT STUDY_NAME FROM STUDY_INFO WHERE STUDY_CODE = CALENDAR.STUDY_CODE) as studyName , (SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_CODE = CALENDAR.UPDTUS_ID) as updtusId FROM CALENDAR WHERE STUDY_CODE IN (SELECT STUDY_CODE FROM USER_IN_STUDY WHERE USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y') AND ((START_DT >= #{searchMonthFrom} AND START_DT <= #{searchMonthTo}) OR (END_DT >= #{searchMonthFrom} AND END_DT <= #{searchMonthTo})) AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as RNUM , main.* FROM ( SELECT /*+ ordered use_nl(bt) INDEX_DESC(bt BOARD_IDX ) */ bt.BOARD_CODE as boardCode , bt.BOARD_TITLE as boardTitle , (SELECT ui.USER_ID FROM USER_INFO ui WHERE ui.USER_CODE = bt.RGSTUS_ID) as rgstusId , TO_CHAR(bt.RGDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as rgdtDt , bt.BOARD_COUNT as boardCount , (SELECT si.STUDY_NAME FROM STUDY_INFO si WHERE si.STUDY_CODE = bt.STUDY_CODE) as studyName FROM BOARD_TB bt WHERE bt.USE_YN = 'Y' AND bt.BOARD_TYPE = '30' AND bt.STUDY_CODE IN (SELECT us.STUDY_CODE FROM USER_IN_STUDY us WHERE us.USER_CODE = #{currentUserCode} AND us.USE_YN = 'Y' ) ) main WHERE ROWNUM <= #{last} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{first}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_TB WHERE BOARD_TB.USE_YN = 'Y' AND BOARD_TB.BOARD_TYPE = '30' AND BOARD_TB.STUDY_CODE IN (SELECT us.STUDY_CODE FROM USER_IN_STUDY us WHERE us.USER_CODE = #{currentUserCode} AND us.USE_YN = 'Y' )

SELECT STUDY_NOTICE.NOTICE_CODE as studyNoticeCode , STUDY_NOTICE.NOTICE_TITLE as studyNoticeTitle , STUDY_NOTICE.NOTICE_DESC as studyNoticeDesc , STUDY_NOTICE.NOTICE_CNT as studyNoticeCount , STUDY_NOTICE.RGDT_DT as studyNoticeTime , STUDY_NOTICE.UPDT_DT as studyNoticeUpdateTime , STUDY_INFO.STUDY_NAME as studyNoticeStudyName , (SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE STUDY_NOTICE.RGSTUS_ID = USER_INFO.USER_CODE) as studyNoticeRgstusId FROM STUDY_NOTICE, STUDY_INFO WHERE STUDY_INFO.STUDY_CODE = STUDY_NOTICE.STUDY_CODE AND STUDY_NOTICE.NOTICE_CODE = #{studyNoticeCode} AND STUDY_INFO.USE_YN = 'Y'
